self.title: CDISC CDASH Concomitant Medication Dosing Frequency per Interval Terminology

definition: A terminology subset of the CDISC SDTM Frequency codelist created for CDASH Concomitant Medication Dosing Frequency per Interval codelist. (NCI)
name: Concomitant Medication Dosing Frequency per Interval
preferredTerm: CDISC CDASH Concomitant Medication Dosing Frequency per Interval Terminology
synonyms: Concomitant Medication Dosing Frequency per Interval

terms.definition: Two times per day, at unspecified times. (NCI)
A rate of occurrences within a period of time equal to one day.
Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused. (NCI)
